Headline: Update: #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Lake Shore Dr/Belmont
ShortDescription: Update:NB 147 buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Oak, Inner Lake Shore Dr., LaSalle, Stockton, Cannon Dr., and Sheridan near Lake Shore Drive/Belmont.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Updated: Northbound  #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Oak, Inner Lake Shore Drive, LaSalle, Stockton, Cannon Drive, and Sheridan due to street blockage near Lake Shore Drive/Belmont.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at 79th
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at 79th due to a door problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at 79th due to a door problem on a train.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
